title: Family Values
description:
Joey Rinaldi, Kristjana Hillberg, and J. Rohr share stories about perineum problems, a traumatic incident at a party, and a family's disagreements about guns. 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Joey Rinaldi, Kristjana Hillberg, Loma, Miles Davis, J. Rohr, Kirby Krackle, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, David Byrne, Brian Eno)
